NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
LAEVI: Lami, please, use the <color=orange>Artificial Gravity Highway</color> normally. We shall be late returning home to <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> at this rate!
2
1
LAMI: Hah! The great Lami has no need for the <color=orange>Artificial Gravity Highway,</color> when he is able to jump to impossible heights!
3
1
LAMI: Just watch, Laevi! I'm going to jump from the bottom of the highway all the way to the highest district, in one go!
4
3
LAMI: What happened? That jump was so weak.. I was able to jump so much higher earlier, elsewhere on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow!</color>
5
4
LAEVI: That is because we're on the north pole now, Lami..
6
4
LAEVI: If you wish to learn how to jump to greater heights, then I suggest we return to the <color=lightblue>Hourglass Twins</color> without delay!
BH_H EX1 1
BH_H EX6 5
BH_H EX7 6
